Add payment method selection to inventory import (like POS)
description:
Allow users to choose payment method (cash/bank_transfer) when importing inventory with expense recording.

## Changes Required:
1. **lib/stores/inventory.ts** - Add paymentMethod and bankAccountId states
2. **components/inventory/StockAdjustment.tsx** - Add payment method selector UI, fetch bank accounts
3. Pass payment_method and bank_account_id to API in submitMutation

## Backend (Already Done):
- import_stock_with_variant RPC already supports p_payment_method and p_bank_account_id
- Finance logic deducts from cash_book or bank_book based on payment method

title: Viettel E-Invoice API Integration
description:
Integrate Viettel SINVOICE API v2.35 for Vietnam Tax 2026 compliance.

## Scope
- Authentication with Viettel API (token-based)
- Create/Issue invoices (HSM signing)
- Cancel, Adjust, Replace invoices
- Download PDF/XML invoices
- Invoice lookup/search

## Technical Plan
See docs/VIETTEL_INVOICE_INTEGRATION_PLAN.md

## Subtasks
1. Create viettel-client.ts shared module
2. Implement invoice-create Edge Function
3. Implement invoice-download Edge Function
4. Implement invoice-cancel Edge Function
5. Add invoice database schema
6. Create invoice UI components
7. Implement offline queue with sync

title: Add PIT rate field to Product Forms
description:
## Why
Users need to set individual VAT and TNCN rates per product for proper tax categorization.

## What
Update product forms with PIT rate selector:
- components/products/ProductForm.tsx
- components/products/ProductFormAdvanced.tsx

## Changes
1. Add pit_rate to ProductFormData interface
2. Add PIT_OPTIONS aligned with Vietnam Tax 2026:
   - 0.5% - Phân phối hàng hóa
   - 1% - HĐKD khác
   - 1.5% - SX, vận tải
   - 2% - Dịch vụ/XD
3. Update VAT_OPTIONS to match household regime (1%, 2%, 3%, 5%)
4. Add Form.Item for pit_rate with Select
5. Set default values from store tax settings

## Acceptance
- ProductForm shows PIT rate selector
- ProductFormAdvanced shows PIT rate selector
- Default values from store settings
- Submitted data includes pit_rate

title: Remove VAT from receipt templates
description: Update ReceiptTemplate.tsx and PrintButton.tsx to not show VAT breakdown section. Receipts should show subtotal and total only (no VAT line).

title: Add pit_rate column to products table
description:
## Why
Products need individual TNCN (Personal Income Tax) rate settings to support Vietnam Tax 2026 S1-HKD revenue report categorization.

## What
Create a migration to add pit_rate column to the products table:
- Column: pit_rate NUMERIC(4,2) nullable
- Valid values: 0, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 5 (%)
- Add comment explaining the column purpose

## How
1. Create migration file: supabase/migrations/YYYYMMDD_add_product_pit_rate.sql
2. Add column with ALTER TABLE
3. Optionally backfill existing products with store default pit_rate
4. Run pnpm supabase:gen to regenerate TypeScript types

## Acceptance
- Migration file created and applied
- TypeScript types regenerated with pit_rate field
- Existing products backfilled with store default

title: Update Products Edge Function with pit_rate support
description:
## Why
Products API needs to accept and store pit_rate, with fallback to store settings when not provided.

## What
Update supabase/functions/products/index.ts:
- Add pit_rate?: number to CreateProductRequest and UpdateProductRequest
- On create: use body.pit_rate ?? store.pit_rate ?? 0.5 as default
- On update: only update if provided

## Acceptance
- Create product without pit_rate uses store default
- Create product with pit_rate uses provided value
- Update product pit_rate works correctly

title: Link inventory import to finance expense
description:
Implement automatic expense recording when importing inventory (Task 4.11.2 from PHASE_4_FINANCE.md).

## Requirements
- When inventory import is recorded, automatically create corresponding cash_book entry (expense/debit)
- Use reference_type='inventory_import' and reference_id=inventory_log.id to link records
- Support optional flag to skip auto-expense (for adjustments/corrections)
- Update balance atomically in the same transaction

## Implementation
1. Modify inventory/import action in Edge Function
2. Add cash_book entry creation with proper linking
3. Consider using RPC for atomic transaction
4. Add UI toggle for 'Record as expense' (default: true)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Import creates inventory_log AND cash_book entry atomically
- [ ] cash_book entry has correct reference_type/reference_id
- [ ] Balance is updated correctly
- [ ] UI shows option to skip expense recording
- [ ] Existing imports without expense still work

title: Implement Sổ tồn kho (Inventory Book) Export - XLSX & PDF
description:
## Overview
Implement per-product inventory book export matching Vietnamese accounting standard template (Sổ chi tiết vật liệu, dụng cụ, sản phẩm).

## Template Reference
`docs/book-templates/SO-CHI-TIET-VAT-LIEU,-DUNG-CU,-SAN-PHAM.xlsx`

## Requirements

### Data Structure
- **Per-product tracking**: Each product gets its own sheet/section
- Track: Tồn đầu kỳ → Nhập trong kỳ → Xuất trong kỳ → Tồn cuối kỳ

### Columns (Multi-level headers)
| Group | Sub-columns |
|-------|-------------|
| STT | - |
| Chứng từ | Số hiệu, Ngày tháng |
| Diễn giải | - |
| Tồn đầu kỳ | Số lượng, Thành tiền |
| Nhập trong kỳ | Số lượng, Đơn giá, Thành tiền |
| Xuất trong kỳ | Số lượng, Đơn giá, Thành tiền |
| Tồn cuối kỳ | Số lượng, Thành tiền |

### XLSX Export (openpyxl)
- Multi-level merged headers
- Formulas (NOT hardcoded values):
  - `Thành tiền = Số lượng × Đơn giá`
  - `Tồn cuối kỳ SL = Tồn trước + Nhập SL - Xuất SL`
  - `Tồn cuối kỳ Tiền = Tồn trước tiền + Nhập tiền - Xuất tiền`
  - Summary rows: `=SUM()` for Cộng nhập, Cộng xuất
- Column widths matching template
- Number formatting: #,##0 for VND amounts
- Borders and styling

### PDF Export (jspdf-autotable)
- Same layout as XLSX
- Vietnamese font support
- Print-ready A4 landscape
- Header: Store name, product info, period
- Footer: Page numbers, export date

### Summary Rows
- Cộng nhập trong kỳ (Total receipts)
- Cộng xuất trong kỳ (Total issues)
- Tồn cuối kỳ (Ending balance)

## Files to Create/Modify
- `lib/reports/inventory-book-export.ts` - Export utilities
- `lib/reports/templates/inventory-book.ts` - Template definition
- `components/reports/InventoryBookPreview.tsx` - Preview component

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] XLSX export with working formulas
- [ ] PDF export with Vietnamese characters
- [ ] Per-product sheets/sections
- [ ] Summary rows calculate correctly
- [ ] Matches template format exactly

title: BE: Create user_stores junction table and migration
description: Create migration for: 1) user_stores table (user_id, store_id, role, is_default, created_at) 2) Keep users.store_id as current_store_id for active store selection 3) Migrate existing data from users.store_id to user_stores 4) Add RLS policies for user_stores

title: Add translations for new onboarding steps
description:
Add i18n translation keys for new onboarding steps:
- onboarding.categories.* (title, description, common categories)
- onboarding.products.* (title, description, sample products)
- Skip button labels

Files: messages/en.json, messages/vi.json

title: Fix Edge Function security: use anon key instead of service role key
Update tax Edge Function with correct household business rates
description: The tax Edge Function has hardcoded enterprise rates (8%, 10% VAT) instead of household business rates (1-5% VAT, 0.5-5% PIT). Need to update: 1) Type definitions for new rate options, 2) detect_revenue_tier default recommendations, 3) Default PIT rate based on business type. Note: Household business VAT is calculated on revenue (direct method), not added to invoices like enterprise VAT (deduction method).

title: Rewrite revenue_book report with S1-HKD categorization
description:
## Why
Revenue report must categorize sales into 4 columns based on product VAT/TNCN rates per Vietnam Tax 2026 S1-HKD template.

## Category Mapping
- VAT 1% + TNCN 0.5% → goods_distribution (Phân phối hàng hóa)
- VAT 5% + TNCN 2% → service_construction (Dịch vụ, XD)
- VAT 3% + TNCN 1.5% → manufacturing_transport (SX, vận tải)
- VAT 2% + TNCN 1% → other_business (HĐKD khác)

## Logic
1. Fetch store defaults (default_vat_rate, pit_rate)
2. Query sales with sale_items and products (including vat_rate, pit_rate)
3. For each sale item: resolve effective rates (product ?? store default)
4. Categorize item revenue using rate mapping
5. Aggregate per sale into 4 category columns
6. Compute tax_payable using statutory rates per category
7. Return RevenueBookReport shape

## Acceptance
- Returns new RevenueBookReport interface
- Each sale categorized by product rates
- tax_payable computed correctly
- Fallback to store defaults when product rates null

title: Phase 3: Implement Stock Check Workflow
description: Add create-stock-check and submit-stock-check actions to inventory edge function. Create StockCheckForm component for counting actual inventory. Calculate differences between system and actual quantities. Auto-adjust stock on submission with audit log.

title: Phase 2: Create Receipt Printing Template
description: Create dedicated ReceiptTemplate.tsx component with thermal printer format (58mm/80mm). Include store info header, itemized list, VAT breakdown, payment details, and footer. Support both web print and ESC/POS for thermal printers.

title: Support product variants
description: Products should support variants (size, color, flavor). Need: 1. product_variants table with attributes, 2. variant-specific pricing/stock, 3. UI for managing variants

title: Fix tax code validation: Support 12-digit CCCD for individuals
description: Individual tax codes now use 12-digit citizen ID (căn cước công dân - CCCD). According to Circular 86/2024/TT-BTC, personal ID numbers are used as tax codes. Update validation to accept: 10 digits (legacy), 12 digits (CCCD), 13 digits (business with branch code).

title: Simplify edge functions to call RPCs instead of complex queries
description: Refactor edge functions (pos, finance, debt) to call the new RPC functions instead of doing complex multi-step queries.

title: Phase 7: Reports (dashboard, sales analytics, financial analytics, 7 accounting books)
